title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Delta inches closer to 'basic business,' hints at more premium seats in future
items.description: Delta Air Lines could be adding a basic version of its higher-end fares, and teased a growing number of premium seats in the future.

items.title: Delta to fly Salt Lake City's first-ever nonstop to South America
items.description: Delta Air Lines will connect Salt Lake City and Lima in Peru nonstop from December.

items.title: Are airline credit cards worth it anymore?
items.description: TPG helps you decide whether the benefits that come with an airline credit card make it worth keeping in your wallet.

items.title: New York JFKâ€™s $19B rebuild: The giant, new Terminal One is just a year away
items.description: A hardhat tour of the new Terminal One at New York's JFK Airport that is set to open in 2026.

items.title: Deal alert: Points and miles travel deals for July 2025
items.description: Save, maximize and earn points and miles on various travel purchases this July.
